White Cloud Chili

aloria

by @gnuconsulting

Chili can have beans. Deal with it. üòé

What you need

  • 2 tbsp olive oil
  • 1 medium onion - chopped
  • 4 medium jalape√±os - seeded, minced
  • 2 cans Great Northern beans, drained
  • 1 can (7 oz.) green chilis
  • 2 c. cooked chicken, cut to bite size
  • 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper
  • 2 tsp basil, chopped
  • 6 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tbsp lime juice
  • 2 cup chicken broth

Do this

  • In a large pot, heat olive oil over high heat
  • Saut√© onion, garlic, and jalape√±os until soft, scrape out and set aside
  • Add broth, cumin, cayenne pepper, and chicken pieces, and bring to boil
  • Add onion, garlic, and jalape√±o mix back in
  • Add green chilis, beans, basil, and lime juice
  • Heat thoroughly and season to taste
